name: Lab Runner: X
description:
You are trapped in your lab and must escape! Play as the Scientist and run as fast as you can through these brutal levels!

Features:


  • Over 30 Brutal Levels!
  • Dodge Homing Missiles!
  • Dodge Drones!
  • Dodge a Big Drone with Homing Missiles!
  • Dodge Bullets!
  • Dodge and Run a Lot!
  • AND MORE!
